Package model

Class Cinema

java.lang.Object
model.Cinema
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cinema extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a cinema found within a cineplex.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Cinema

      public Cinema(Cineplex cineplex, CinemaClassType cinemaClass, int code, SeatLayout seatLayout)
      Creates a new cinema in the given cineplex, with the given class, code and seat layout.
      Parameters:
      cineplex - The cineplex that this cinema belongs to.
      cinemaClass - The cinema's class.
      code - This cinema's code.
      seatLayout - This cinema's seat layout.
